name: Paparazzi (itch)
description:
Rithm Gaming Presents:

Paparazzi:

Sign Autographs and Take Selfies With Your Fans!

~

Sometimes being super famous comes with its own set of problems.

Play the part of a famous celeb. and try to dodge the paparazzi.

~

Controls/Instructions:

*Mouse/Keyboard Required*

Take pictures with fans: Click on camera icons (right hand side of screen)

Sign autographs: Type appropriate key as displayed on screen (left hand side)

Most importantly: Have fun, and try and beat your high scores!

~

Recommended browser: Chrome

~

Yes, this is a LD40 game, show me some love. https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/paparazzi

~

Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com
